nodes.text: The skirmish on Cholganna was a conflict fought sometime before 3678 BBY. The skirmish was waged by agents of the Sith Empire, and resulted in the deaths of many of the Abyssin Qawohl's comrades. In the aftermath of the struggle, the Sith Acolyte Teneb Kel discovered Qawohl and spared his life, taking him from Cholganna as a slave and familiar.

The skirmish on Cholganna was first mentioned in The Old Republic, Blood of the Empire Act 2: The Broken World, the second issue of the Blood of the Empire webcomic. The event was alluded to by the Abyssin slave Qawohl, however, no information was provided on who was involved in the skirmish other than the Sith Imperials and Qawohl himself.
